column1: Most people who become infected have symptoms.
The most common symptoms are fever and joint pain.
The disease can lead to death in frail older adults.
- Take ibuprofen (Motrin, Advil), naproxen (Aleve, Naprosyn), or acetaminophen (Tylenol) to relieve pain and fever.
Call your health care provider if you develop symptoms of chikungunya.
Your provider may do a blood test to check for the disease.
- Use insect repellent with DEET, picaridin, IR3535, oil of lemon eucalyptus, or para-menthane-diol.
